text: Ri jastaq tijowik rij chiqapam keꞌ wi, xuqujeꞌ ri qapam kꞌolibꞌal rech ri jastaq tijowik rij, ukobꞌchal kꞌu waꞌ kakꞌis na tzij puꞌwiꞌ rumal ri Dios. Are kꞌu ri utyoꞌjal ri winaq man rech ta mak kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kukꞌ taq ixoqibꞌ, xane rech ri Ajawxel, xuqujeꞌ ri Ajawxel are ajchoqꞌe ri utyoꞌjal ri winaq.
